document_data.name: Bloodbite
document_data.Powers: Per [[Sharantyr]], bloodbite was extremely deadly, but too many people had since developed a resistance to it.
document_data.History: When [[Tornar]] poisoned Sharantyr in {{yearlink|1357}} using a crossbow bolt and announced his bolt was poisoned, Sharantyr assumed the poison to be bloodbite and said as much.
